function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the interaction with home energy management systems in a pandemic.","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to contagious diseases and potential spread within households and communities.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene protocols for installation and maintenance of HEMS, promote contactless solutions and remote monitoring, and educate users on proper health and safety measures.","Technologies":"Contactless and remote monitoring solutions, IoT sensors for occupancy and air quality monitoring, and UV-C disinfection technology for HEMS components.","People":"Residents, technicians, and maintenance personnel interacting with HEMS.","Owner":"Health and safety authorities, HEMS manufacturers, and service providers."}]}
